introduction.title: Introducing Armory -

introduction.content_hackers: If hackers have Kali Linux, CISOs have Armory
introduction.content_welcome: Welcome to Cisotronix, where we turn CISOs into cybersecurity heroes.
introduction.content_flagship: Our flagship product, Armory, is the go-to workspace for Chief Information Security Officers, offering a suite of tools and functions specifically tailored for the unique challenges and responsibilities of cybersecurity leadership.
